front.title: Extensions to the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) User Agent Profile Delivery Change Notification Event Package for the Extensible Markup Language Language Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP)

abstract.t: The SIP User Agent profile delivery framework describes how a User Agent can retrieve its data using a variety of protocols and defines a SIP event package for notifications of changes to those profiles. This document extends that event package to support XCAP (XML Configuration Access Protocol).
